text: Race with the Devil is a 1975 American action horror movie directed by Jack Starrett and starring Peter Fonda, Warren Oates, Loretta Swit, Lara Parker, R. G. Armstrong, Clay Tanner. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 action movies Category:1970s road movies Category:1975 horror movies Category:American action movies Category:American horror movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Starrett Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Race with the Devil
